CRITERIA.LABEL: Not on renal replacement therapy (HD, PD, CRRT)
CRITERIA.TOOLTIP: No orders for hemodialysis, peritoneal dialysis, or CRRT

CRITERIA.LABEL: Critical Care Unit or have telemetry monitoring in place (telemetry monitoring order)
CRITERIA.TOOLTIP: Room type: Critical Care, PCU, Telemetry, MS (Med/Surg) with Telemetry Monitoring order

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Magnesium: 1.8 - 2.0 mg/dL
Step 1 - Order most appropriate replacement:

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 1 g, IVPB, Premix, Once, Infuse over: 1 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT: Intravenous

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Step 2 - Order corresponding follow-up lab(s):
Monitoring: Recheck BMP and magnesium level with next AM labs.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Requested Draw Date and T T+1;0400, Blood, Tomorrow AM collect, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Order a Magnesium Level with next AM labs.

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Magnesium: 1.4 - 1.7 mg/dL
Step 1 - Order most appropriate replacement:

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 2 g, IVPB, Premix, Once, Infuse over: 2 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT: Intravenous

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Step 2 - Order corresponding follow-up lab(s):
Monitoring: Recheck magnesium level 4 hrs after infusion complete.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Requested Draw Date and T T;N+360, Blood, Timed Study collect, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Recheck magnesium level 4 hrs after infusion complete.

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Magnesium: < 1.4 mg/dL
NOTIFY PHYSICIAN if less than 1.2 mg/dL
Step 1 - Order most appropriate replacement:

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 2 g, IVPB, Premix, q2hr (interval), Duration: 2 dose(s), Infuse over: 2 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT: Intravenous

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Step 2 - Order corresponding follow-up lab(s):
IV - Labs:
Monitoring: Recheck magnesium level 4 hrs after infusion complete.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Requested Draw Date and T T;N+480, Blood, Timed Study collect, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Recheck magnesium level 4 hrs after infusion complete.

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME: Magnesium Lab Orders

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Blood, ASAP (Now) collect, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Order a STAT Magnesium Level.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Requested Draw Date and T T+1;0400, Blood, Tomorrow AM collect, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Order a Magnesium Level with next AM labs.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Requested Draw Date and T T+1;0400, Blood, Tomorrow AM collect, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Order a BMP with next AM labs.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Requested Draw Date and T T;N+240, Blood, Timed Study collect, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Collect mag level 4 hours after event

CRITERIA.LABEL: Not on renal replacement therapy (HD, PD, CRRT)
CRITERIA.TOOLTIP: No orders for hemodialysis, peritoneal dialysis, or CRRT

CRITERIA.LABEL: Critical Care Unit or have telemetry monitoring in place (telemetry monitoring order)

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Potassium: 3.6 - 3.9 mmol/L
Step 1 - Order most appropriate replacement:
* If patient is not NPO, and tolerating oral medications, the recommended choice of replacement route is to be oral.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 20 mEq, PO, ER tab, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Oral *

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 20 mEq, Feeding Tube, Liq, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Feeding Tube *

ORDERS.MNEMONIC: potassium chloride 10 mEq/100 mL intravenous solution
ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 10 mEq, IV, q1hr, Duration: 2 dose(s), Infuse over: 1 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT: Peripheral IV

ORDERS.MNEMONIC: potassium chloride 20 mEq/100 mL intravenous solution
ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 20 mEq, IV, Once, Infuse over: 1 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT: Central IV Preferred

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Step 2 - Order corresponding follow-up lab(s):
IV - Labs:
Monitoring: Recheck BMP with next AM labs.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Requested Draw Date and T T+1;0400, Blood, Tomorrow AM collect, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Order a BMP with next AM labs.

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Potassium: 3.2 - 3.5 mmol/L

* If patient is not NPO, and tolerating oral medications, the recommended choice of replacement route is to be oral.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 20 mEq, Feeding Tube, Liq, q2hr (interval), Duration: 2 dose(s)

ORDERS.MNEMONIC: potassium chloride 10 mEq/100 mL intravenous solution
ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 10 mEq, IV, q1hr, Duration: 4 dose(s), Infuse over: 1 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT: Peripheral IV

ORDERS.MNEMONIC: potassium chloride 20 mEq/100 mL intravenous solution
ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 20 mEq, IV, q1hr, Duration: 2 dose(s), Infuse over: 1 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT: Central IV Preferred

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Step 2 - Order corresponding follow-up lab(s):
ORAL - Labs:
Monitoring: Recheck potassium level 4 hours after last dose.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Requested Draw Date and T T;N+480, Blood, Timed Study collect, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Recheck potassium level 4 hrs after last dose.

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
PERIPHERAL IV - Labs:

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:

Step 1 - Order most appropriate replacement:

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 20 mEq, PO, ER tab, q2hr (interval), Duration: 3 dose(s)

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 20 mEq, Feeding Tube, Liq, q2hr (interval), Duration: 3 dose(s)
ORDERS.COMMENT: Feeding Tube

ORDERS.MNEMONIC: potassium chloride 10 mEq/100 mL intravenous solution
ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 10 mEq, IV, q1hr, Duration: 6 dose(s), Infuse over: 1 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT: Peripheral IV

ORDERS.MNEMONIC: potassium chloride 20 mEq/100 mL intravenous solution
ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 20 mEq, IV, q1hr, Duration: 3 dose(s), Infuse over: 1 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT: Central IV Preferred

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Step 2 - Order corresponding follow-up lab(s):
ORAL - Labs:
Monitoring: Recheck potassium level 4 hrs after last dose.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Requested Draw Date and T T;N+600, Blood, Timed Study collect, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Recheck potassium level 4 hrs after last dose.

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
PERIPHERAL IV - Labs:
Monitoring: Recheck potassium level 1 hr after infusion complete.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Requested Draw Date and T T;N+420, Blood, Timed Study collect, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Recheck potassium level 1 hr after infusion complete.

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
CENTRAL IV - Labs:
Monitoring: Recheck potassium level 1 hr after infusion complete.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Requested Draw Date and T T;N+240, Blood, Timed Study collect, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Recheck potassium level 1 hr after infusion complete.

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Potassium: < 2.8 mmol/L
NOTIFY PHYSICIAN
Step 1 - Order most appropriate replacement:

ORDERS.MNEMONIC: potassium chloride 10 mEq/100 mL intravenous solution
ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 10 mEq, IV, q1hr, Duration: 8 dose(s), Infuse over: 1 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT: Peripheral IV

ORDERS.MNEMONIC: potassium chloride 20 mEq/100 mL intravenous solution
ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: 20 mEq, IV, q1hr, Duration: 4 dose(s), Infuse over: 1 hr
ORDERS.COMMENT: Central IV Preferred

ORDER_SECTIONS.SECTION_NAME:
Step 2 - Order corresponding follow-up lab(s):
Monitoring:
1. Add-on mag & phos levels STAT, if not recently obtained.
2. Recheck potassium level 1 hr after infusion complete.
3. Repeat BMP, mag and phos levels with next AM labs.
1. Add-on mag & phos levels STAT, if not recently obtained.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Requested Draw Date and T T;N, Blood, Routine Today collect, Once, add to specimen in lab
ORDERS.COMMENT: Order an add-on Phosphate Level.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Requested Draw Date and T T;N, Blood, Routine Today collect, Once, add to specimen in lab
ORDERS.COMMENT: Order an add-on Magnesium Level.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Requested Draw Date and T T;N+300, Blood, Timed Study collect, Once
ORDERS.COMMENT: Recheck potassium level 1 hr after infusion complete.

ORDERS.ORDER_SENTENCE: Requested Draw Date and T T+1;0400, Blood, Tomorrow AM collect, Once
